answers.answer: Have you checked your blood pressure? I've battled elevated bp since Friday and that is how I feel. The headache got worse the higher my bp went.

I havent and my midwife is useless ive still got a headache and pain killers arent helping ill give it a couple more hours and if I feel the same ill call the hospital I just dont feel good at all thank you for your response

Have you tried a cup of coffee followed by water and some paracetamol? Caffeine works. Have had headaches on and off this pregnancy. Usually 2 rounds of this spaced about 4 hrs apart gave me relief. I then was just so tired i would sleep a whole day

You should immediately check your blood pressure if its high u need to rush to hospital as it can be preeclampsia though it is also accompanied by swelling but to be on safe side you shld check your BP
Thank you for your reaponses guys headache has eased off now its still there but not to bad if it keeps on ill go to hospital thanks again
I know I'm a little late, but a lot of times headaches are connected to dehydration, would also explain the fatigue.

Thats ok I appreciate any response i looked up about it when I started to feel crappy and saw about dehydration so ive been drinking more. The headache has eased im still getting cramps along with tightenings now too I stress at every twinge so dont want to rush to hospital for nothing. I have a scan early tomorrow so if anything is going on theyll no but if I do feel worse ill go straight to hospital thank you all very much for your support and gl with your babies :)

question: Hi im 31 weeks with no 2 and I need advise. Ive been getting cramps on and off since 3 and its now 6 I have a headache and all I want to do is sleep. I did the school run which is a 20 min walk there and back and ive felt like this ever since. Every time I get up I just want to sit down curl up and go to sleep.
title: what would you do?
